noproxy: unset http_proxy HTTP_PROXY https_proxy HTTPS_PROXY all_proxy ALL_PROXY ftp_proxy FTP_PROXY dns_proxy DNS_PROXY JAVA_OPTS GRADLE_OPTS MAVEN_OPTS
setcassnpm:
echo '配置开思 NPM'
npm config set registry http://npm.dev.casstime.com/
npm config set @casstime:registry http://npm.dev.casstime.com/
npm config set always-auth true
npm config set //npm.dev.casstime.com/:_authToken eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..m6u-yYXUxqWP1Ozo6S7_wA6EKSjCVIkEmlTtJNeubRw;
echo '配置 NPM 加速镜像'
npm set sass_binary_site https://registry.npmmirror.com/-/binary/node-sass
npm set electron_mirrorhttps://registry.npmmirror.com/-/binary/electron/
npm set puppeteer_download_host https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors
npm set chromedriver_cdnurlhttps://registry.npmmirror.com/-/binary/chromedriver
npm set operadriver_cdnurlhttps://registry.npmmirror.com/-/binary/operadriver
npm set phantomjs_cdnurlhttps://registry.npmmirror.com/-/binary/phantomjs
npm set selenium_cdnurlhttps://registry.npmmirror.com/-/binary/selenium
npm set node_inspector_cdnurlhttps://registry.npmmirror.com/-/binary/node-inspector
echo '配置 NPM 成功'
